name: Paddle Ping
description:
Paddle Ping is a fast paced game of computer paddle tennis. It comes with some juicy game play. It can be played of minutes at a time against your local friends, if you have any, or against the computer, if you don't. 

This is the first game I have completed using the Godot Engine. 

Music by: https://freesound.org/people/d...

Everything else by: Funlamb
